author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

Another quick BuildFile cleaning PR in the style of many before (for example https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33445).

This PR cleans unnecessary includes from CMSSW BuildFiles that were recently added for 12_0_0_pre2.

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport intended.
title: More BuildFiles cleaning
